english: Where is the nearest airport?
I need to buy a ticket to Warsaw.
Can I see your passport, please?
Is this the way to the hotel?
polish: Czy to jest droga do hotelu?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ tɔ jɛst ˈdrɔɡa dɔ xɔˈtɛlu

english: I would like a discount, please.
Can you help me find the pharmacy?
polish: Czy możesz mi pomóc znaleźć aptekę?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ ˈmɔʐɛʂ mi ˈpɔmut͡s ˈznalɛɕt͡ɕ apˈtɛkɛ

english: How is the weather today?
I need to see a doctor.
Can you show me the way to the hospital?
polish: Czy możesz pokazać mi drogę do szpitala?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ ˈmɔʐɛʂ pɔˈkazat͡ɕ mi ˈdrɔɡɛ dɔ ʂpiˈtala

english: Is it going to rain tomorrow?
Where can I find a good restaurant?
Can you recommend a good hotel?
I would like to order food, please.
How much does this cost?
Can I have the menu, please?
I feel unwell, I need a doctor.
Where is the nearest bus stop?
Can you help me find a taxi?
polish: Czy możesz mi pomóc znaleźć taksówkę?
phonetic: t͡ʂɨ ˈmɔʐɛʂ mi ˈpɔmut͡s ˈznalɛɕt͡ɕ takˈsufkɛ

english: What time does the train leave?
I need a map of the city.
